How to Use:

1. Install Word Replacer Max from the extension store
2. Add it to your toolbar by selecting the "Pin" option in your browser's Extensions menu
3. Click on the Word Replacer Max icon in your toolbar to open the popup window
4. Add search terms, define replacements, configure matching patterns, and manage domains to tailor your web content
5. Browse the web with peace of mind, enjoying a smoother and more personalized experience
